channel.title: SlideShows of the Day
channel.description: SlideShare feed for SlideShows of the Day

item.title: Tools and Techniques for Faster Development
item.description: We’ll walk through the process of building an application and solving the typical problems you might encounter along the way. Find out what tools and techniques work best for each class of problem and learn some shortcuts and tips along the way. We’ll mainly cover mobile web development, Chrome Canary, and OS X tools. Difficulty level: Beginner to Intermediate.
item.content:encoded: We’ll walk through the process of building an application and solving the typical problems you might encounter along the way. Find out what tools and techniques work best for each class of problem and learn some shortcuts and tips along the way. We’ll mainly cover mobile web development, Chrome Canary, and OS X tools. Difficulty level: Beginner to Intermediate.
item.author: jtaby@slideshare.net(jtaby)

media:content.media:title: Tools and Techniques for Faster Development
media:content.media:description: We'll walk through the process of building an application and solving the typical problems you might encounter along the way. Find out what tools and techniques work best for each class of problem and learn some shortcuts and tips along the way. We'll mainly cover mobile web development, Chrome Canary, and OS X tools. Difficulty level: Beginner to Intermediate.
media:content.media:text: We’ll walk through the process of building an application and solving the typical problems you might encounter along the way. Find out what tools and techniques work best for each class of problem and learn some shortcuts and tips along the way. We’ll mainly cover mobile web development, Chrome Canary, and OS X tools. Difficulty level: Beginner to Intermediate.

item.title: Sold Our Souls To The Devil
item.description: Sold our souls to the devil and wrote a book. "DON’T SUCK! How to make presentations rock". This eBook for iPad will help you create great stories and visually awesome slides. Say NO to crappy slides.

item.title: Creating a Great Mobile Experience = iOS Meetup Tokyo Aug 2012
item.description: Great UX is difficult to achieve, partly because we don’t have a good mental model of "what" it is. UX Is not an activity, it’s a goal and we discus how you achieve it with mobile apps. Presented by Paul Chapman from Moneytree KK (@pchap10k) at Tokyo iOS Meetup.
item.content:encoded: Great UX is difficult to achieve, partly because we don’t have a good mental model of "what" it is. UX Is not an activity, it’s a goal and we discus how you achieve it with mobile apps. Presented by Paul Chapman from Moneytree KK (@pchap10k) at Tokyo iOS Meetup.
item.author: pchap10k@slideshare.net(pchap10k)

media:content.media:title: Creating a Great Mobile Experience = iOS Meetup Tokyo Aug 2012
media:content.media:description:
Great UX is difficult to achieve, partly because we don't have a good mental model of "what" it is. UX Is not an activity, it's a goal and we discus how you achieve it with mobile apps.
Presented by Paul Chapman from Moneytree KK (@pchap10k) at Tokyo iOS Meetup.
media:content.media:text: Great UX is difficult to achieve, partly because we don’t have a good mental model of "what" it is. UX Is not an activity, it’s a goal and we discus how you achieve it with mobile apps. Presented by Paul Chapman from Moneytree KK (@pchap10k) at Tokyo iOS Meetup.

item.slideshare:embed: Creating a Great Mobile Experience = iOS Meetup Tokyo Aug 2012 from Paul Chapman

item.title: Pinterest Your Resume!
item.description: This presentation shares the technique I used for an interview using Pinterest boards on an iPad as a resume in lieu of a traditional printed resume. It was visual, interactive, engaging...and no paper! Their HR department had never seen anything like it!
item.content:encoded: This presentation shares the technique I used for an interview using Pinterest boards on an iPad as a resume in lieu of a traditional printed resume. It was visual, interactive, engaging...and no paper! Their HR department had never seen anything like it!

media:content.media:title: Pinterest Your Resume!
media:content.media:description: This presentation shares the technique I used for an interview using Pinterest boards on an iPad as a resume in lieu of a traditional printed resume. It was visual, interactive, engaging...and no paper! Their HR department had never seen anything like it!

item.title: Is This The Era Of Womens Leadership? Statistics & Review (Mapsofworld.com)
item.description: Find In-depth Review On History of Women’s Leadership. From reigns of queens, women’s rights, women in politics, most powerful women, women vs men and statistics on women leadership. Learn more here - http://www.mapsofworld.com/poll/era-of-womens-leadership.html

item.title: Impact of Emerging Exponential Technologies in the way we practice Medicine
item.description: I was asked to give a talk in my university regarding Emerging Technologies and their impact on how we Practice Medicine. People were skeptic about the presentation due to the subject and possible content. Audience was captivated, intrigued, and craving for more. Hope you enjoy this slides as much as I enjoyed making them. Some of the slides were obtained from a conference I attended called "Futuremed 2011 at Singularity University" I highly recommend you google Daniel Kraft’s talk and Astro Teller Feel free to contact me at: Twitter @christianassad christian.assad-kottner @ singularityu.org
item.content:encoded: I was asked to give a talk in my university regarding Emerging Technologies and their impact on how we Practice Medicine. People were skeptic about the presentation due to the subject and possible content. Audience was captivated, intrigued, and craving for more. media:content.media:title: Impact of Emerging Exponential Technologies in the way we practice Medicine
media:content.media:description:
I was asked to give a talk in my university regarding Emerging Technologies and their impact on how we Practice Medicine.
People were skeptic about the presentation due to the subject and possible content. Audience was captivated, intrigued, and craving for more.
Hope you enjoy this slides as much as I enjoyed making them.
Some of the slides were obtained from a conference I attended called "Futuremed 2011 at Singularity University" I highly recommend you google Daniel Kraft's talk and Astro Teller
Feel free to contact me at: Twitter @christianassad christian.assad-kottner @ singularityu.org

item.title: 10 lessons I learned from The Dark Knight
item.description: 10 Lessons that I learned from the Batman! An ultimate guide to replicate the fantastic qualities and powers of Dark Knight in the real world Pragmatically! Lesson # 1 Envision a Vision! http://www.slideshare.net/thinktank1987/self-transcendence Lesson # 2 Be a Life Long Student! Lesson # 3 Be Humane! http://www.slideshare.net/thinktank1987/human-rights-concepts-know-your-rights | http://www.slideshare.net/thinktank1987/compassion-empathy-emotional-intelligence Lesson # 4 Synergize! Lesson # 5 Become An Active Citizen! http://www.slideshare.net/thinktank1987/youth-and-millennium-development-goals Lesson # 6 Be The Leader! http://www.slideshare.net/thinktank1987/leadership-skills-elucidated Lesson # 7 Be the Legend! http://www.slideshare.net/thinktank1987/personal-branding-10606521 Lesson # 8 Be the Best Detective! http://www.slideshare.net/thinktank1987/what-is-blogging-11740126 Lesson # 9 Think Strategically! http://www.slideshare.net/thinktank1987/thinking-skills-10600153 Lesson # 10 Keep on Mentoring!

item.title: 10 Ways Librarians Can be a Marketing Genius Like Lady Gaga
item.description: EdTech professionals will be challenged to become a change agent within their profession by implementing education and social media marketing tools within their daily practice. The presentation will focus on teaching and learning in the digital age and the importance of social media leadership as a communication device for educators with students, parents, and the community.
item.content:encoded: EdTech professionals will be challenged to become a change agent within their profession by implementing education and social media marketing tools within their daily practice. The presentation will focus on teaching and learning in the digital age and the importance of social media leadership as a communication device for educators with students, parents, and the community.
item.author: gwynethjones@slideshare.net(gwynethjones)

media:content.media:title: 10 Ways Librarians Can be a Marketing Genius Like Lady Gaga
media:content.media:description: EdTech professionals will be challenged to become a change agent within their profession by implementing education and social media marketing tools within their daily practice.
